attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what plans did our president have for us and what he plan on doing for his campaign but this is the worst app ever. It takes way to much time to download new content and I really hate it.
attributes.title: Wait

attributes.review: I am infuriated with this app. I downloaded this app in order to support out WONDERFUL president and the first thing i saw was “keep america great”. EXCUSE ME, last i checked it was only great for rich old white straight cis men. I refuse to believe that our leader would to the us like that. FAKE. NEWS.
attributes.title: FAKE NEWS

attributes.review: this app was absolutely terrible, as soon as it downloaded it completely hacked my phone and some big oompa loompa looking dude popped up on my screeen every 5 seconds. it erased all my contacts and photos and replaced them with picture of some chubby orange man. this app so D I S G U S T I N G.
attributes.title: t r a s h

attributes.review: I opened the app and d trump had a WHITE SUPREMACY SYMBOL. it’s also a confusing trashy app that provided absolutely nothing also gave “factual” information that was completely fake. this should be taken down ✨🧚🏻better luck next time
attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting

attributes.review:

attributes.review: So I was just wondering what would happen if I  downloaded this app and me being the idiot that I am I did it I download this app and when I opened the app I saw the most horrifying orange thing and it sad place your mobile number here Ahhhhhhh no no iii’s comiggg!!
Honestly the app did not tell me any useful Information, I dont think it’s been updated in months. It kept kicking me out of it everytime I tried to get it. Would not recommend
attributes.title: Super buggy

attributes.review: This app took numerous days to download, not to mention the horror I saw when the scary hot cheeto popped up the moment I opened the app. The racist man almost gave me a heart attack. I don’t recommend this app unless you want to be jump scared by both bunker boys face, and his policies🧚‍♀️❤️😇
attributes.title: Caillou🧚‍♀️

attributes.review: The fact that this app barely functions as and app and this administration is here for silencing people I do have to rate this app  with on Star if I could rate it lower I would this is truly heartbreaking and disturbing. You can’t silence the people
attributes.title: Honestly upsetting

attributes.review: For some very odd reason whenever I try to put my mobile phone number in and hit enter the app randomly blurts out grab them by the 😺or YOURE FIRED. I don’t know what it is it is very vulgar and demeaning. It seems to alternate the sayings every time I try.
